    "The development of an affordable, eco-friendly water filter with health assurances has made significant strides in social and environmental protection. This endeavor aligns closely with the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals established by the United Nations.Through its social program, which focuses on delivering water filters to rural schools in Guatemala, Ecofiltro has positively impacted the lives of approximately 1 million families in these regions. By providing access to safe drinking water, Ecofiltro has markedly enhanced their quality of life.Operating on a \"social business\" model, a portion of the filter sales in urban areas finances the distribution of filters in rural regions. Between 2014 and 2022, this approach facilitated the distribution of 33,751 Ecofiltros to 6,210 schools.Furthermore, Ecofiltro has made significant environmental contributions by substantially reducing carbon emissions. By eliminating the need to boil water for purification, Ecofiltro has led to a reduction of approximately 459,097 tons in firewood usage, equivalent to saving 500,000 trees in the country and mitigating the risk of deforestation.On a global scale, Ecofiltro plays a vital role in combating plastic pollution, particularly in oceans and seas. This technology reduces reliance on non-biodegradable packaging, thereby addressing one of the most pressing environmental crises of our time. With its presence in Europe, Ecofiltro contributes to saving approximately 6.5 million plastic bottles annually.In recognition of Ecofiltro's commitment to social and environmental responsibility, we proudly achieved B Corp certification in February 2020. This milestone further underscores our dedication to promoting sustainable practices and enhancing public health.Join us in our mission to create positive social and environmental change. Together, we can make a meaningful difference in the lives of communities worldwide and safeguard our planet for future generations, all through the use of Ecofiltro. The development of an affordable, eco-friendly water filter with health assurances has made significant strides in social and environmental protection. This endeavor aligns closely with the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals established by the United Nations.Through its social program, which focuses on delivering water filters to rural schools in Guatemala, Ecofiltro has positively impacted the lives of approximately 1 million families in these regions. By providing access to safe drinking water, Ecofiltro has markedly enhanced their quality of life.Operating on a \"social business\" model, a portion of the filter sales in urban areas finances the distribution of filters in rural regions. Between 2014 and 2022, this approach facilitated the distribution of 33,751 Ecofiltros to 6,210 schools.Furthermore, Ecofiltro has made significant environmental contributions by substantially reducing carbon emissions. By eliminating the need to boil water for purification, Ecofiltro has led to a reduction of approximately 459,097 tons in firewood usage, equivalent to saving 500,000 trees in the country and mitigating the risk of deforestation.On a global scale, Ecofiltro plays a vital role in combating plastic pollution, particularly in oceans and seas. This technology reduces reliance on non-biodegradable packaging, thereby addressing one of the most pressing environmental crises of our time. With its presence in Europe, Ecofiltro contributes to saving approximately 6.5 million plastic bottles annually.In recognition of Ecofiltro's commitment to social and environmental responsibility, we proudly achieved B Corp certification in February 2020. This milestone further underscores our dedication to promoting sustainable practices and enhancing public health.Join us in our mission to create positive social and environmental change. Together, we can make a meaningful difference in the lives of communities worldwide and safeguard our planet for future generations, all through the use of Ecofiltro. The development of an affordable, eco-friendly water filter with health assurances has made significant strides in social and environmental protection. This endeavor aligns closely with the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals established by the United Nations.Through its social program, which focuses on delivering water filters to rural schools in Guatemala, Ecofiltro has positively impacted the lives of approximately 1 million families in these regions. By providing access to safe drinking water, Ecofiltro has markedly enhanced their quality of life.Operating on a \"social business\" model, a portion of the filter sales in urban areas finances the distribution of filters in rural regions. Between 2014 and 2022, this approach facilitated the distribution of 33,751 Ecofiltros to 6,210 schools.Furthermore, Ecofiltro has made significant environmental contributions by substantially reducing carbon emissions. By eliminating the need to boil water for purification, Ecofiltro has led to a reduction of approximately 459,097 tons in firewood usage, equivalent to saving 500,000 trees in the country and mitigating the risk of deforestation.On a global scale, Ecofiltro plays a vital role in combating plastic pollution, particularly in oceans and seas. This technology reduces reliance on non-biodegradable packaging, thereby addressing one of the most pressing environmental crises of our time. With its presence in Europe, Ecofiltro contributes to saving approximately 6.5 million plastic bottles annually. United Nations.     "The development of an affordable, eco-friendly water filter with health assurances has made significant strides in social and environmental protection. This endeavor aligns closely with the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals established by the United Nations.Through its social program, which focuses on delivering water filters to rural schools in Guatemala, Ecofiltro has positively impacted the lives of approximately 1 million families in these regions. By providing access to safe drinking water, Ecofiltro has markedly enhanced their quality of life.Operating on a \"social business\" model, a portion of the filter sales in urban areas finances the distribution of filters in rural regions. Between 2014 and 2022, this approach facilitated the distribution of 33,751 Ecofiltros to 6,210 schools.Furthermore, Ecofiltro has made significant environmental contributions by substantially reducing carbon emissions. By eliminating the need to boil water for purification, Ecofiltro has led to a reduction of approximately 459,097 tons in firewood usage, equivalent to saving 500,000 trees in the country and mitigating the risk of deforestation.On a global scale, Ecofiltro plays a vital role in combating plastic pollution, particularly in oceans and seas. This technology reduces reliance on non-biodegradable packaging, thereby addressing one of the most pressing environmental crises of our time. With its presence in Europe, Ecofiltro contributes to saving approximately 6.5 million plastic bottles annually.In recognition of Ecofiltro's commitment to social and environmental responsibility, we proudly achieved B Corp certification in February 2020. This milestone further underscores our dedication to promoting sustainable practices and enhancing public health.Join us in our mission to create positive social and environmental change. Together, we can make a meaningful difference in the lives of communities worldwide and safeguard our planet for future generations, all through the use of Ecofiltro. The development of an affordable, eco-friendly water filter with health assurances has made significant strides in social and environmental protection. This endeavor aligns closely with the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals established by the United Nations.Through its social program, which focuses on delivering water filters to rural schools in Guatemala, Ecofiltro has positively impacted the lives of approximately 1 million families in these regions. By providing access to safe drinking water, Ecofiltro has markedly enhanced their quality of life.Operating on a \"social business\" model, a portion of the filter sales in urban areas finances the distribution of filters in rural regions. Between 2014 and 2022, this approach facilitated the distribution of 33,751 Ecofiltros to 6,210 schools.Furthermore, Ecofiltro has made significant environmental contributions by substantially reducing carbon emissions. By eliminating the need to boil water for purification, Ecofiltro has led to a reduction of approximately 459,097 tons in firewood usage, equivalent to saving 500,000 trees in the country and mitigating the risk of deforestation.On a global scale, Ecofiltro plays a vital role in combating plastic pollution, particularly in oceans and seas. This technology reduces reliance on non-biodegradable packaging, thereby addressing one of the most pressing environmental crises of our time. With its presence in Europe, Ecofiltro contributes to saving approximately 6.5 million plastic bottles annually. United Nations. This milestone further underscores our dedication to promoting sustainable practices and enhancing public health.Join us in our mission to create positive social and environmental change. We're dedicated to providing plastic-free filtration systems to households across the EU. Join us in our mission for a greener, healthier future. We're dedicated to providing plastic-free filtration systems to households across the EU. Join us in our mission for a greener, healthier future.     "Drawer menu",
    "Social & Environmental Responsibility",
    "The development of an affordable, eco-friendly water filter with health assurances has made significant strides in social and environmental protection. This endeavor aligns closely with the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals established by the United Nations.Through its social program, which focuses on delivering water filters to rural schools in Guatemala, Ecofiltro has positively impacted the lives of approximately 1 million families in these regions. By providing access to safe drinking water, Ecofiltro has markedly enhanced their quality of life.Operating on a \"social business\" model, a portion of the filter sales in urban areas finances the distribution of filters in rural regions. Between 2014 and 2022, this approach facilitated the distribution of 33,751 Ecofiltros to 6,210 schools.Furthermore, Ecofiltro has made significant environmental contributions by substantially reducing carbon emissions. By eliminating the need to boil water for purification, Ecofiltro has led to a reduction of approximately 459,097 tons in firewood usage, equivalent to saving 500,000 trees in the country and mitigating the risk of deforestation.On a global scale, Ecofiltro plays a vital role in combating plastic pollution, particularly in oceans and seas. This technology reduces reliance on non-biodegradable packaging, thereby addressing one of the most pressing environmental crises of our time. With its presence in Europe, Ecofiltro contributes to saving approximately 6.5 million plastic bottles annually. United Nations.   Ecofiltro 1 million families   2014 2022 33,751 Ecofiltros 6,210   500,000 trees   6.5 million plastic bottles",
    "In recognition of Ecofiltro's commitment to social and environmental responsibility, we proudly achieved B Corp certification in February 2020. This milestone further underscores our dedication to promoting sustainable practices and enhancing public health.Join us in our mission to create positive social and environmental change. B Corp certification  ",
